SELECT u.nick, c1.ctn ctn, c2.ctn stateCtn, ch.* FROM challenge ch INNER JOIN user1 u ON ch.user_num = u.user_num INNER JOIN comm c1 ON ch.chg_lg = c1.lg AND ch.chg_md = c1.md INNER JOIN comm c2 ON ch.state_lg = c2.lg AND ch.state_md = c2.md
WHERE ch.chg_id = #{chg_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board b INNER JOIN challenge c ON b.chg_id = c.chg_id WHERE brd_lg = 700 AND brd_md = 101 AND c.chg_id = #{chg_id} AND brd_step = 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, b.brd_num , b.title, u.nick, b.view_cnt, b.reg_date, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b INNER JOIN user1 u ON b.user_num = u.user_num INNER JOIN challenge ch ON b.chg_id = ch.chg_id WHERE ch.chg_id = #{chg_id} AND brd_lg = 700 AND brd_md = 101 AND b.brd_step = 0 ORDER BY b.brd_num DESC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT c.ctn FROM user1 u INNER JOIN comm c ON u.status_lg = c.lg AND u.status_md = c.md WHERE u.user_num = #{user_num}

SELECT b.brd_num, b.title, b.conts, b.img, b.reg_date, u.user_num, u.nick, b.view_cnt, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b INNER JOIN user1 u ON b.user_num = u.user_num WHERE b.brd_num = #{brd_num}
